ImHex Library :version:`1.24.0` :extension:`ImHex`
==================================================

The ImHex library contains various functions to interact with the ImHex Hex editor. 

.. note::
    
    This library can only be used inside of ImHex. Other programs that use the pattern language might not implement these features.

Libraries
---------
